mapper.select: SELECT ppt.id, ppt.p_info_id, ppt.post_id, ppt.resume_id, ppt.status, ppt.created_at, jpt.title, jpt.deadline, ct.name FROM PERSON_PROPOSAL_TB ppt INNER JOIN JOB_POST_TB jpt ON ppt.post_id = jpt.id INNER JOIN COMPANY_INFO_TB ct ON jpt.c_info_id = ct.id where ppt.p_info_id = #{pInfoId}

SELECT ppt.id, ppt.p_info_id, ppt.post_id, ppt.resume_id, ppt.status, ppt.created_at, jpt.title ptitle, jpt.c_info_id, rt.title rtitle, pt.name FROM PERSON_PROPOSAL_TB ppt inner join job_post_tb jpt on ppt.post_id = jpt.id inner join resume_tb rt on ppt.resume_id = rt.id inner join person_info_tb pt on ppt.p_info_id = pt.id where jpt.c_info_id = #{cInfoId}

SELECT ppt.id, ppt.p_info_id, ppt.post_id, ppt.resume_id, ppt.status, ppt.created_at, jpt.title, jpt.c_info_id FROM PERSON_PROPOSAL_TB ppt inner join job_post_tb jpt on ppt.post_id = jpt.id where jpt.c_info_id= #{cInfoId} and resume_id= #{resumeId};
mapper.insert: insert into person_proposal_tb (p_info_id, post_id, resume_id, status, created_at) values(#{pInfoId}, #{postId}, #{resumeId}, #{status}, now())
